task.title: Configuring the upload of the RDF ouptput to an RDF repository
task.shortdesc: How to configure the to upload the RDF output to your RDF repository

prereq.p: You should already have an RDF repository available, either on your computer or on a server you can access.
If you don't have one, the default configuration assumes you use Apache Marmotta. Here are the installation instructions (standalone).

step.cmd: In [DITA-OT]/plugins/com.github.colinmaudry.dita2rdf/customization, make a copy of build_template.properties.

step.info: As long as their is a file named build.properties in this directory, the DITA OT plugin will attempt to upload the RDF output according to the provided configuration, at every transformation. As a consequence, if you want to disable these attempts, either rename, move or delete this file.

step.cmd: In build.properties, follow the instructions. If you use Marmotta locally (on your computer, not a server), you have nothing to change, I configured it for you ;-)

taskbody.result: The is configured for the upload of the RDF output to a repository. Unless you rename, move or delete build.properties, the output of all transformations will be uploaded.
